Text: FK Austria Wien:  With 27 victories in the Austrian Cup and six in the Austrian Supercup, Austria Wien is also the most successful club in each of those tournaments, and has won the most national titles of any Austrian football club.

Text: FK Austria Wien: The club reached the UEFA Cup Winners' Cup final in 1978, and the semi-finals of the European Cup the season after.
